purpose: To assist developers in coding tasks by providing automated code generation, debugging assistance, and documentation features
principle: Utilizes AI-driven algorithms for code generation and bug detection, with support for customizable prompts to tailor the development experience
reusability: Offers integration with IDEs such as IntelliJ, supports customizable prompts, and provides an API for automation of development tasks
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited language support and feature stability issues
name: auto-dev
description: 🧙‍AutoDev: The AI-powered coding wizard（AI  驱动编程助手）with multilingual support 🌐, auto code generation 🏗️, and a helpful bug-slaying assistant 🐞! Customizable prompts 🎨 and a magic Auto Dev/Testing/Document/Agent  feature 🧪 included! 🚀
highlight: Multilingual support with customizable prompts and auto code generation
